headline: CenterPoint Energy to sell Dayton natural gas business for more than $2.6 billion
summary: Oct. 22—CenterPoint Energy announced Tuesday the sale of its Ohio natural gas distribution business, Vectren Energy Delivery of Ohio, to National Fuel Gas Company for a little more than $2.6 billion. The assets include approximately 5,900 miles of transmission and distribution pipeline in Ohio serving approximately 335,000 metered customers in all or parts of Montgomery, Warren, Clark, ...
